explains: n. （监狱或精神病院里的）居住者；<古>（房屋的）同住者

sentences.en: An inmate learns to ride a unicycle in the prison gym seriously.
sentences.cn: 一个囚犯在监狱的健身房里认真地学习骑独轮车。

sentences.en: He learned this song as an inmate at a Texas prison.
sentences.cn: 他在德克萨斯监狱服刑时学会了这首歌。

sentences.en: A large Caucasian inmate steps forward.
sentences.cn: 一个强壮的白人向前迈了一步。
